column2: Piercing eyes shake your confidence.
These eyes warm your heart.
There is something mysterious about them eyes.
These help you see the light.
You succumb to the stare of pair of hypnotic eyes, to much consequence.
Gross, but still adorable.
By looking into this eye you are soothed 3 times over.
Makes you feel insecure and threatened.
You feel oddly calm.
You are intrigued.
Makes you feel bad for looking at it.
A Klutz draws near, falling into everything in his path. If you're lucky, he will be his only victim.
Questions you profusely.
You pay him a lot of money to boost your confidence.
He wants you to work on Saturday.
column3: 7-Spin: Spin once to set the variable, spin again to match or surpass the number to win and escape. If you lose, -1D, -1G,-1V

column2: He insults you on a profoundly innovative level.
You are happy you are not marrying this intensely delusional and difficult woman.
He takes your money with promises of a healthier future for us all.
BOO! YOU WIN!
His shadow's on the wrong side. It's highly disturbing.
Hanging out with this guy has caused you nothing but trouble.
It is full of great stuff.
He is very wise, and his facial hair inspires confidence.
All you wanted was respect, and sometimes that is tough to find.
This clown is just as sinister as it looks.
She lights up your life.
He comes after you looking for capital.

column1: Sir Reginald The Cyclopean Monocle Mayor
column2: If you've got the gumption, he can provide the deeds!
column3: Trade as many gumption as you like for deeds.

column2: “The safest route is along the bottom of the board. Do you really want to play it safe?”
“Advice: Avoiding all of the dark monsters is a good idea.”
“Higher stats don't make you a better person, only different.”
“Potions shake your game up.”
“Pay close attention to colours and similar character features. They will help guide you.”
“Monsters will engage you in battle, and you can win these by pumping up your stats.”
A god among men. Leave an impression with him.
column3: 4Spin:  1= He likes you. +1D, +1G, +1V 2= He doesn't notice you and walk past. 3= He doesn't thick much of you. -1G 4= He hates you. -1D, -1G, -1V

column2: He is twice the man you are and makes you feel insignificant.
You admire his qualities a lot and he inspires you to be a better person.
You feel tall.
Gross! This guy got the wrong end of the deal.
column3: -1V / If you started this turn on Half a Man, you feel pretty bad about the tall joke. -2V

column2: His Vigour rubs off on yours.
His confidence far exceeds his height. So much so, he challenges you to an arm wrestling match!
Standing next to a guy with this many enemies was a bad decision.
He tries hard to win your favour.
He is better than everybody.
This un-jolly fellow takes your stuff away for himself.
This date is going nowhere.
What you wear will never be good enough.
Looks easy enough to take...
column3: Leave the baby's candy alone. / Take his candy. +2V and -4G

column2: He's directing traffic in an unusual way.
column3: Move straight downward only on your next spin.

column2: This is what you get for associating with this guy.
All he ever wants to do is compete with you.
You try really hard not to stare.
You run into jerks now and then. Sometimes you get a chance to shut their mouth.
His face was meant for walking. He'll walk all over you if you let him.
He makes the best tea, if he likes you.
His immaturity is beyond annoying for his age. He holds you back.
Some people wear their cowardice on their shirt.
Defeat him and drink his juice for much Vigour. Lose and suffer at his juicy hands.
column3: Chose to challenge Juice Lee, 7-spin, greater than 6 to win +3V, Lose = -3V, or walk away.

column2: You start to feel like self-preservation should be more of a priority.
He can't wait to sail away to paradise... with the right person.
He makes you feel awful, and there is no talking back.
He's moving on up and taking you with him, because he likes the cut of your jib.
column3: Spin and move straight upward only on your next spin.

column2: He seems to be in there against his will. Will you ignore him, or help him out by shattering the glass?
You can count on this guy to be always looking up, no matter what.
column3: Move upward, up to two spaces.

column2: You scamper through the streets at night.
column3: 4-spin: Find some  -1V / It accepts you into its group. +2G / It defends its territory and attacks you. -1G, -1V /It robs you of the cash in your wallet. -3D

column2: It's an adorable rabbit, here to give you a warm fuzzy feeling.
This particular rabbit, while fuzzy, is extraordinarily deadly.
You start to notice ways that your actions affect the balance of nature.
column3: Trade up to -3G for up to +3V

column2: This dumb duck is so annoying! (“How annoying is he?”)
Helmet Cat challenges you to a race for big $$$.
column3: Spin once for yourself, then once for Helmet Cat. Win= +3D, Loss= -3D

column2: It takes you for a frightening flight.
column3: -2G and add +2 to your next turn.

column2: Evolution is scary! Maybe you should kill this thing before it breeds.
Nude Rabbit loves you very much. It makes you feel very loved by taking care of you.
Most owls are wise, but this one isn't one of them.
column3: Go straight to one of the following squares: (varying degrees of difficulty and/or loss)

column2: This bear helps you achieve a certain... clarity.
You never know what is going to happen when a sleepwalking dog passes you by.
column3: 4Spin:  1= It sniffs you and passes you by. / 2= It bites you. -2V / 3= It licks your wounds. +1V / 4= It howls disturbingly loud at you. -2G

column2: He learned a lot from his former swashbuckling master. Now he's a professional prate of his own.
His conversation is so slow. You think he's giving you advice, but you can't bear to stand around long enough to hear it.
This strange creature is a rare hybrid of your two favourite foods.
column3: "Gross! No it's not!" (Keep moving.) / "Looks delicious!" (Cook him up for +2V)

column2: Think you got what it takes to take down a professional grizzly wrestler? Or are you gonna run away like a coward?
column3: 7-Spin > 5: +2D / Run away. Your next move is 3 spaces straight forward.

column2: Don't worry about the smell. They say when a seagull vomits on you, it's good luck!
In the pecking order, she is queen.
Every interaction today feels like arguing with an angry ape.
He forces you into his horse racing gambling ring.
He has a way of roping you into a game of roulette.
It chews you up and spits you out.
Afro Ducky knows where all the cool hangouts are.
Serpent Flamingo seduces you into a nice massage.
Fat dog is super big and fluffy and he warms your heart when you pat him.
They are here to test your patience.
column3: Vigour Test: 4 or more = win. Easily ignored. 3 or less = -1V

column2: Inviting Ghost invites you to be haunted.
This ghostly mutt sinks his icicle fangs into you, and chills your soul.
+ Dog approaches you in a friendly manner and guides you through the dark.
column3: +1 to your movement on your next turn.

column2: Hard No passes through you. You find it difficult to move forward.
column3: Only move up to 2 on your next turn.

column2: Big Up floats you upward.
This ancient fossil releases a ghost, who possesses your body temporarily.
column3: Move directly forward 3 spaces. (to a space that makes sense to a ghost)

column2: From its cold dead finger comes a flash of light, and you are instantly teleported.
column3: Move directly forward 4 spaces (to a negative space)

column2: This spirit haunts your heart with an intense feeling of love and tenderness.

column1: Hallucinatory Dynamo of a Neckless Freak
column2: While you try to figure out what it is, it possesses your body. Next thing you know you are somewhere else.
column3: Move 3 squares straight ahead. (warp to another square)

column2: This artifact leaves you feeling strangely compelled to wander.
column3: Move in any direction at all on your next turn.

column2: It really seems to want to treat you well. You are spoiled almost to death before you finally escape.
column3: Set your V to 2, Set your D to 8.

column2: This unfulfilled crocodile needs to bite someone in order to leave purgatory, but it's having a hard time.
column3: Allow yourself to be bitten, slowly but surely. -1V, +1D

column2: He haunts your path, wandering purgatory in search of fires. He lights you aflame, and then douses you in water.
column3: Move ahead to Seemingly Shallow Puddle

column2: He haunts your wallet, and cash disappears from it.
Nobody remembers who he is, and he is angry from the grave. He needs money to make a comeback.
This skull baffles the most seasoned archaeologists.
You toothbrush is now haunted, and you are afraid to brush your teeth.
A Floating Demon Goat Head draws near. Time for battle!
It gives you twice the licking.
You come across something that you cannot un-see.
A Tallish walks quickly and effortlessly towards you. You feel dwarfed by its size.
The shiftiest smile you ever saw. It stays trapped in your mind and bothers you all day.
It wants to suck your blood and eat your brains.
By the light of a full moon, he comes to take your stuff.
If you aren't on your game, it will charm you into submission.
Hell hath spawned the worst thing ever! OW!
Always trying to prickle your day. Perhaps you can make the best of it.
He will gaze upon your works, and perhaps reward you with a wish.
This amazing discovery emerges rapidly from the local laboratory.
Indigenous to irradiated areas. Watch out for its bite.
column3: 7-Spin Battle: Greater than 6 = Win for +1D, 6 or less = lose for -2D, -2G -2V

column2: Tiny he may be, this sperm might be more vigorous than thee.
He is determined to prove his vigour over all other sperm.
This guy is the pitts. He wants to steal your steel. Are you gonna let him burg you like that?
You thought it was bad going out in the springtime. This plant turns your sinuses into vats of acid.
column3: 7-Spin Battle: Greater than 5 = Win for +1V, 5 or less = lose for -3V

column2: He's tiny and he's everywhere! He wants to exchange your nutrients for poison.
column3: 7-Spin Battle: Greater than 9 = Win for +3D, +3G, +3V. 8 or less = lose for -1V

column2: Puberty rears its ugly head (once again).
column3: Vigour Test: 5 or more = win for +2V. 4 or less = -2V

column2: Will wreak havoc on your heart if you aren't healthy.

column2: Will make you heavier if you aren't in shape.

column2: This guy pushes everyone around with his flashy demeanour. Time to put him in his place.
column3: Deeds Test: 5 or more = win for +2D. 4 or less = -2D

column2: Are you ready for the slow and steady management of the great unconditional L'ove?
column3: Deeds Test: 7 or more = win for +1D. 6 or less = loss for -2D.

column2: Even an all-powerful creature can have a moment of weakness and guilt for all the wrong it has done.

column2: It can taste everything, especially fear.

Kisswalker smooches you to near-suffocation.
Terrible Envy wants what you have, and takes it.
Dark Card only gambles for high stakes.
She makes you feel good psychologically, but in the end you get burned.
They don't call it a murder for nothing.

He guards what is behind him tenaciously.

It always eventually shows up.

column2: His flashy exterior makes him difficult to avoid.

column2: Appears out of nowhere, then takes you back with him. You know not where he's going to.

column2: Black ghosts are scarier.
He is out to hurt you. He will run you over if you aren't fast enough to get away.

At the risk of looking unfashionable, you could add some comfort to your step.

column2: Sure, you might *look* stupid, but you will feel like you're in the future.
Do you dare experience what is in the bucket?

column2: It stops you in your tracks.

You're flabbergasted by this visual depiction, and you can't look away.

column2: This must be what they meant by "meteoric rise."
Inside was discontinued hot sauce, as you find out to your great chagrin a little too late.
Are you going to risk eating what is inside?
column3: Choose: Walk away from the Mystery Can / 4-Spin: 1= Mmm, Soup. +1V / Mmm, dog food. -1V / Mmm, maple syrup. +2V / Mmm... you're not sure what it was, but you feel lemony fresh and smooth as a shiny floor. -2V

This album changes the way you perceive the world.
Wearing this hideous thing instantly lowers your self-esteem. Everyone leaves you alone.
column3: -2G, Next turn has no effect no matter what you land on.

column2: Just owning this thing ruins your reputation. You are shunned by everyone.
column3: -2D, Next turn has no effect no matter what you land on.

column2: Who hung all of these nooses here? You take them down before someone gets hurt.
This latest innovation in tax collection takes loose change right out of your pockets.
This strange coin is pretty rare! Must be worth about 3.5 cents.
This expensive book is filled with political notions that you may or may not want to subscribe to.
According to Poetic Justice, virtue is rewarded and vice is punished.

column2: According to the Giant Rule Book you must do the following:

column2: This expensive book ends up being ten pounds of empty platitudes. How disappointing.

column2: Reading this stuff makes your life a little more boring.

column2: It seems to focus only on tragedy, as if designed to ruin your day.
Great reads inspire great deeds.
Here it is, sealed up in a nice little package. You open it and give it a read. It's about lemurs.
Definitely none of your business. You wish you could unread it, but you can't.
He gladly floats above to guide you for a while.
column3: On your next turn you should land on either: (pick 1 positive square to land on that is close)

Meet Gloria. She judges people for a living, and you are next.

He says he's got something you've really got to read.

column3: +1 to your movement on your next turn.

column2: It is scalding hot on the outside, and absolutely freezing on the inside.
EW! Gross! Don't touch that!

The ball of Madness brings you to a state of madness.
It goes off and hurts your ears, because it is so very loud.
Brain Ball challenges you to a thinking contest. You lose.
Picking it up and carrying it with you makes you feel great.
Fortune Orb knows where you are going next.

Grab a snack.

column2: Will take you places, but only in a straight line.

column2: It proceeds to dump a bunch of emotions all over you. More than you can handle.
Spider Camera has the scoop.
This machine is impossible to use. It seems designed to fail.
This machine broadcasts loudly what you're up to.
It is not sure exactly what its primary function is, yet it is still alive. You help it by programming a primary function into its artificial intelligence.
It eats up a lot of your dollars and cents.
There is no getting past this thing.

column2: You are stuck behind this slow moving vehicle.

Feeling lucky? Why not try a pill from the Pill Dispenser.

column2: He has no soul, so naturally you give him some of yours.
Chaos erupts after the peace goes out.
When you're done drinking this, you find the world has changed.

column2: It's like an ON switch for your mind.
Clearing out any residual thoughts can make you happier.
So intense that it hurts.
It's like a liquid library. You quaff it greedily.
Ugly Bottle means ugly effects. You shouldn't have drunk this.
Time takes its toll on you much more quickly.
column3: Move 10 spaces on your next turn.

column2: Emptying this bottle relieves you of much stress.
You drink this and persistently vomit for hours.
You cannot believe you were suckered into paying for this stuff that doesn't even work.
The floor seems somehow more menacing than it did yesterday.
You notice a footprint in the Wet Cement and take the opportunity to also deface it. Immediately a police officer jumps out of the nearby bushes and charges you with vandalism. - 1D
This stuff is specially formulate dot help you make the most of a situation. +3D, +3G, and +3V
It ends up begin much deeper
Eew. Gross. You are all sticky.

Not to worry, citizen. We'll get you cleaned up in no time.
May they bring you all the sadness you desire.
Your imbalanced diet conks you out hard.
You don't know what's in this sandwich you just ate, but it's definitely not what you ordered.

Are you MAN enough to take this thick cut on?

column2: Whatever that was sure had a lot of nutrients in it.

column1: Regular and Diet Poison Spazzy Cola
column2: Ugh! I never drink that Poison Spazzy Cola! Give me the other Poison Spazzy Cola.
Tastes like a mop bucket, but chills you right out.
Relax. It's Tea Time.
You've been told this is bad for you. It certainly looks bad.
When you asked for all the toppings, this wasn't what you had in mind.
So sweet, you'll be too giddy to notice all your molars caving in.
Goes great with everything! Try it on steak and potatoes.
You used to think coffee breath was bad BEFORE people started dunking these in their mugs.
Each batch is lovingly brewed by a dedicated team of focus group statisticians.
Gracefully it drifts down, gently it explodes.
If you've got half a gun, you'll just have to be twice as good a shot.
When the spikes go up, better hope you're not going down.
You have no idea how this got in your couch cushions.
Great for space nails.
Be glad you're not Q.

This office was constructed by Hammurabi himself. You haven't yet found a use for all his leftover office supplies.

Immediately upon opening your senses are invaded by an overwhelming intense pungency of exquisite rotting. The tears in your eyes make it difficult to tell what it once was. You then feel violently ill and vomit. -1V
The guilt trip taxes your confidence and takes you on a journey you never would have willfully intended on going. -2G and move forward 2 spaces.
You never really get a clear view of what is inside. The mystery eats away at your conscious as your imagination gets to the best of you. -1G

column2: You can only go up from here.
An event touches you so deeply that you are staggered, unable to think of anything else.
column3: The next square you land on, ignore any effects and spin again immediately.

column2: Basic tasks, social interactions, they are all for your weary mind to handle today.
column3: The next square you land on, ignore any effects and spin again immediately.

column2: Upon breathing this in, you feel some strange effects.
You reflect on what you have accomplished for the good of others.

column2: You return to the living world, and take a fresh look at everything you see.
The world is full of laughter and fear. Sometimes you can't tell the difference.
Today you're stuck in bed, with a sickness so palpable you can see it.
Formidable indeed.
Move straight ahead 3 spaces
Move straight ahead 5 spaces

Questions and quandaries plague your mind.
Snazzy!
Has nothing better to do than poke his nose in your business.
Nice day to build snowmen at the beach!

You've been waiting for a change in the weather, but this is loony.
A product of brilliant minds.
You are haunted by relationships past.
Your breakfast somehow makes you more cheerful than usual.

column2: Don't touch it. Don't even go near it.
It hurts your eyes to look at, and hurts your pride to wear it.
Stop and enjoy the scenery a moment. Now away with ye!
The sign said "Keep off the grass." You wish you'd paid attention.
You stand at attention, and when told to march, you march.
It definitely shouldn't be that colour.
The floor seems somehow more menacing than it did yesterday.
Eeeew!
Battle this foe in complete darkness, or be cast out of his domain.
You are blinded by the light!
You're feeling great!
Watch where you're going!
You're up in the clouds. You're so close.
You're thinking you should've voted for the vampire.
Maybe we would have been better off with the lizard.
Quickly, can you dodge this savage blow?
Some young hooligans are tearing through your neighbourhood.
A breeze and sunshine are coming through the window. Your mind drifts away from your work.
column3: Move anywhere within the next 2 columns.

column2: You find yourself staring at a screen at 5 AM, and this is how you feel.
Discover ancient secrets.
column3: Move to any square in the next two columns.

column2: Access granted only for those with enough... power.
The colours of the world change around you, and you find yourself elsewhere.
column3: Move to any square in the next 3 columns.

column2: Absolute stillness makes a startling contrast to your racing thoughts.
Hey you over there! Head down and get back to work!
Nice new electronic device you've got there! Hooking it up might take a while.
column3: Move up to 2 squares this turn.

column2: You spend more time than you should staring at this, but it gives your mind some time to focus.
You briefly gain the power of far sight, and learn many strange things.
The full moon glints off of the waves, and a misty vessel seems to appear in the distance.
You pay your passage downriver, and enjoy a relaxing voyage.
Ever since the night that otherworldly light shone on you from the sky, you've been feeling lucky.
You won't feel good tomorrow, but you sure feel great right now!
You probably should have thought twice before grabbing these off the shelf.
A glimpse into the fourth dimension leaves you confused, but fascinated.
The people are taking to the streets. Are you one of them, or are you just in their way?
This isn't looking good.
It takes guts to drive a road like this.
Could be hazardous to your composure.
It could be around any corner, but usually the warning signs are there.
Your history teaches you ways to fight the battles ahead.
Remember to watch where you're going!
The world passes through the filter of your discerning eye.
You're not sure if that's handshake, a fist bump, or a high five coming your way. Think fast!
Suddenly you have so many options.
column3: 7spin to move on your next turn.

column2: You've got a lot riding on this!
You think back fondly of people you've lost, and feel happy to be alive.
You think back fondly of people you've lost, and celebrate life while you have it.
Your species rules the world because of its limitless adaptability.
The cold weather transforms your face into an ice sculpture.
Just keep moving forward and don't look back.
column3: Move straight ahead on your next spin.

column2: You find a calm place near the edge of the sky.
Games weren't always so flashy and bright. You make fun with what you have.
He seems way too friendly and helpful. You wonder where he came from.
Makes you feel like a million bucks! (Mud Wave afterward)
You score a critical hit in battle! (all monsters within 2 squares' movement)
column3: Move up to 2 squares and score the maximum on your spin.

column2: One shape can always be transformed into another.
When in doubt, it's a solid choice.
The angles... they are not real!
The world seems determined to sap all your strength.
You can survive any kind of weather the world throws at you, if you use your head.
You thought it was finally spring, but the world had other plans.
The world seems a violent, raging maelstrom.
The world seems a cold place, that can burn you all the same.
For an instant, the pressure drops, and you feel a crackling energy coursing through the air.
It's a little sticky out today. You don't think you'll make it far.
Seek shelter from the storm... over that way!
column3: Move only straight ahead or down on your next turn.

column2: The sky is an evil colour today. Wherever you're going, go quickly!
For a moment the sky and the earth are connected.
It rips a path straight through everything. Quickly leap out of the way!
column3: Move up to 2 squares straight up or down.

column2: Swirling winds scatter everything around the landscape, including you.
column3: 4-spin: Move 2 up / Move 2 down / Move to the top of next column / Move to bottom of next column

column2: This wave is cheerfully coloured, but a painful ride.
A tsunami of muddy water, all over your nice new clothes! (after Money Suit)
You're feeling especially radical today.
Something about this water makes you not want to get wet.
It's coming whether you like it or not, so why not surf it?
You probably shouldn't have left the house today.
The sunrise is invigorating. Or is that a sunset?
You definitely can't go this way.
column3: Move only up or forward next turn.

column2: The fiery pressure inside has finally broken loose. Run as fast as you can!
It seems a little less impressive than most rainbows.
The strangest things happen to you when you can't sleep. (sometime before Recurring Nightmare)
A great cure for so many ills.
Taste the rainbow.
column3: Trade: -3 to any, +3 of any other.

column2: Is that passion you are feeling, or is it stomach acid?
This would be relaxing if it wasn't so ominous.
It appears every night, leaving you wishing you still had insomnia!
Everything goes black...
...and suddenly everything is blinding white. (7 past coma)
During a feverish illness, you seem to remember a shadowy figure tending to you.
Your fever is rising. The chills are taking hold.
We had a little accident, but it's not like it's the end of thFWOOOOOSHH!!!!!
column3: Trade: -3 to any two, +3 to the other

column2: Another month passes, and you pause to reflect.
You take comfort in the fact that no matter what happens here, you have a chance to start over somewhere else...
You embark on a great adventure from which you might not return.
column3: 4spin > 2: Move directly to Space Station / Move directly to Gibbous Moon

column2: You've never really believed in signs from the heavens, but this is undeniably portentous.
column3: Trade: -3 to any, +1 to any other

column2: Advanced technology and a great view, what more could you ask for?
You are visited by an unearthly presence. They leave you with gifts and knowledge.
column3: Trade: -2 to any, +1 to any other

column2: A strange glow suffuses you, and you feel an upward pull. (directly below UFO)
This coloured shape boggles your mind.
This multicoloured object baffles you. (2 past Hypercube)
This multidimensional polyhedron leaves you disoriented. (2 past Tesseract)
This pan-dimensional, omnicoloured geometric impossibility nauseates and enlightens you.
A state of great disturbance, confusion, or uncertainty.
Extreme agitation of the mind or emotions.
Confusion resulting from failure to understand.
A feeling of embarrassment that leaves you confused.
The condition of being confused or disoriented.
The state of being uncertain; doubt; hesitancy.
Inability or failure to comprehend; lack of understanding.
The state of being annoyed, frustrated, or worried.
Inability to deal with or understand something complicated or unaccountable.
A mental state characterized by a lack of clear and orderly thought and behaviour.
No matter how bad you have it, his problems are probably bigger than yours.
Your pet is the fiercest hunter ever to prowl a round glass bowl.
Your pet is a menace to all worldly creatures, as long as they're smaller than an apple.
Its beauty is blinding.
Its beauty is blinding, even in the absence of light.
Its beauty blinds you with brighter colours than you have ever seen.
Hard work brings sweet rewards.
He looks harmless, but once you let him in he causes havoc.
You do not fear the darkness. (3 before a few dark monsters)
column3: You have +3G for the next turn only.

column2: Lately you've felt like you can see through everyone.
Quick, put it back in!
Sometimes bright colours are there as a warning. Sometimes they are the best way to hide yourself.
This pixel's edges are razor sharp!
Meeting this cat's gaze, you feel like you will be extra lucky for the next few turns.
You let out a piercing caterwaul, to let everyone know
It's so soft, small and helpless, it pushes every sympathetic button in your body.
This elephant will give you a ride if you can make it up on top of his back.
He barely takes notice of such small folk as you.
What's cute and furry on the outside turns out to be
Little-known fact: Tetris is never a single player game. You are always playing against me.
He appears out of nowhere just to mess with you. Getting past him takes wits and skill.
This five-pointed malefactor stares at you from a wall. His piercing gaze judges you harshly.
With a playful whicker that sounds strangely malicious, it offers you a ride. Can you mount this spectral stallion?
column3: Test V > 8, G > 7: +3 to next spin / -3V

column2: This brute threatens you with awkwardly large horns. You think you might be able to slip by...
This wispy fiend offers you passage at a price. (next square is a hazard of some kind)
The weather is today can only be described as malevolent.
This orb flits in front of you, whispering that it can carry you places.
column3: Pay up to 5 D, travel to any square within that many columns.

column2: The night sky glows red. Your sleep is troubled.
The insects buzzing around tonight seem motivated by an uncommon malice.
They're just lying here.
They are lying here in a suspiciously tidy pile.

column1: Stacks and Sacks of Cash and Gold
column2: A pile of wealth is stacked here almost dangerously high.

column1: Stacks and Sacks of Cash and Gold and a Kitten
column2: A pile of wealth is stacked to the ceiling, and it's adorable!
A breeze and sunshine are coming through the window. Your mind drifts away from your work.
A sickly red glow emanates from this entranceway, but you need to get out of the cold. A ghastly voice demands a gift of deeds.
column3: D > 4: -1D and move up 1 square. / -3V and move forward 2 squares.
